resources.string: We aim to prevent occupational accidents by implementing automation systems in every field that requires monitoring of occupational health and safety by starting with the idea of "Let's wear it, follow it, don't lose"
You can check the amount of time that workers on site do not use occupational safety equipment. At the same time you can see the employee\'s score during this time.
You can see the status of your employees in the field, you can automatically receive notification in case of neglect.
You can report the status of environmental protection factors automatically or manually with photographs.
To learn more about using the app, please click on the link below
Please contact us for more information
Fields cannot be left blank ! Please try again
Please carry out the necessary checks !
Indicate positive or negative situations with the following buttons.

Your company has been informed that environmental protection measures have not been taken.
